column2: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ A scrap metal dealer made a mistake after he bought an ------S-5K------ rocket. The Soviet era explosive was reported  to the police at 11:40 AM on May 13
column4: who collected it from the shop on Street 1013
column6: Khan Sen Sok district.------The scrap collector named Hem Kea
column8: said he did not know what he had collected when he got home and began to sort through his daily pickings. However
column9: he felt uneasy about the long steel tube
column10: and on the advice of neighbours contacted the authorities.------Although the rocket was old
column11: it still contained high-explosives and was removed for safe keeping.------People are warned to be vigilant and not to hesitate to report any suspicious objects to the police.------https://kbn.news/archives/122916
